ability:

ability: Order: Move a Skellige unit from your deck to your graveyard, then damage an enemy unit by its power.

name: Bran Tuirseach
ability:
Order: Discard a card, then draw a card.

name: Sigvald
ability:
Whenever this unit is damaged by other non-status abilities, gain Bleeding for the same duration instead.
Order: Damage a unit by the duration of Bleeding on self, then Purify self. If it was an enemy unit, damage self by that amount. If it was an allied unit, boost self by that amount.

name: Artis
ability:
Deploy: Play a 0-provision Cultist from your deck.

name: Dracoturtle

Veteran.

name: Magic Compass

Echo.
